translations: v.<美，非正式>卖弄技艺，表演特技
n.（滑雪或冲浪的）灵巧动作表演者

sentences.sentence: Now I'm gonna go have a hotdog!
The long red sausage which goes into a hotdog is called Frankfurter.
sentences.translation: 放在热狗里的红色长香肠叫做法兰克福香肠。

sentences.sentence: During one lunch period, my friend Denny and I went to the Graben Gore Restaurant to have a hotdog.
sentences.translation: 在一次午餐期间，我和我的朋友丹尼去格拉本戈尔餐厅吃热狗。
